trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated"> </xref> hendelser i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> methods to provide access to the business object instance before any data operations that are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and business object are performed.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ObjectDataSourceEventArgs brukes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A>metoder for å gi tilgang til business objektforekomsten før alle dataene operasjoner som bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen og business objekt er utført.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>

trans-unit.source: The business object is set and accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Business-objektet er angitt, og tilgang til ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating> event, you can create an instance of the business object in custom code instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> performing the instantiation.
trans-unit.target: Ved å legge til en hendelse behandlingsprogrammet representant til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating>hendelse, kan du opprette en forekomst av business-objektet i egendefinert kode i stedet for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>utføring av instantiering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want a non-default instance of your business object or to call a non-default constructor to create the instance; the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> always calls the default constructor to create an instance of the business object it works with.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du vil bruke en ikke-Standardforekomst for business-objekt eller å kalle en ikke-standard konstruktør for å opprette forekomst. den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kaller alltid Standardkonstruktøren for å opprette en forekomst av business-objektet prosessen fungerer med.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can also add an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated> event, which enables you to access any publicly exposed members of the business object to perform any additional initialization or work.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også legge til en hendelse behandlingsprogrammet representant til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>som gjør det mulig å få tilgang til noen offentlig eksponert medlemmer for business-objektet til å utføre flere initiering eller jobb.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> methods are not called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, if the business object method that performs the data operations is `static`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A>metoder kalles ikke av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollere hvis metoden for business-objektet som utfører dataoperasjoner er `static`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreated%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnObjectCreating%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>kontrollen viser mange hendelser som kan håndtere, for å fungere med det underliggende objektet business på ulike tidspunkter i livssyklusen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and the associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hendelser og det tilknyttede <xref:System.EventArgs>klasser og hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet representanter.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | EventArgs kan | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|ObjectDataSourceEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Skjer umiddelbart før forekomsten av business-objektet er opprettet. | ObjectDataSourceEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|ObjectDataSourceEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Skjer umiddelbart etter at forekomsten av business-objektet er opprettet. | ObjectDataSourceEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før data som hentes. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før en insert-, update eller delete-operasjonen utføres. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter at dataene er hentet. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Inntreffer etter insert-, update eller delete-operasjonen er fullført. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før en business-objekt er ødelagt. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> interacts to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: Business-objektet som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> samhandler for å utføre dataoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that represents the business object with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control performs data operations.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et objekt som representerer business-objekt som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen utfører av data.

trans-unit.source: The business object the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> uses to perform data operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Business-objektet i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> bruker til å utføre dataoperasjoner; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> er sendt til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs"> </xref>.
